Reviews.Title: Looks better than it really is!
Reviews.Author: Erick
Reviews.Content: OK.. so good things: 1. The bag....even though is very small, vivitar brand; 2. The baterry charger.. excellent.. the best of the whole pack.. vivitar brand as well... 3. the usb card reader and the HDMI cable and 4. the battery; just oK: 1. the tripod.. low quality, not too accurate regarding levels, and looks fragile, the worst: 1. mini tripod.... wouldn't even trust putting my camera there, 2. the cheap screen protectors and the wipper fabric.. Overall: just ok

Reviews.Title: Absolute crap!
Reviews.Author: Lewis
Reviews.Content: Not worth the money! The HDMI cable does not fit the Sony camera. The lens protectors are flimsy and easily scratched. The large tripod is cheaply made and very unstable. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!

Reviews.Title: Looks are deceiving!
Reviews.Author: Margaret Dotson
Reviews.Content: Camera case was not large enough for the camera to fit even though it was recommend. Tripod was very wobbly when holding camera. Mini tripod would not support the camera.

Reviews.Title: The product was delivered incomplete, does not include what it offers
Reviews.Author: Agustin Rivera Dubon
Reviews.Content: The delivery was made on time, but did not get all the pieces that were offered, it took the battery for the DSC-HX200V which was one of the main reasons why you buy the set and this was not provided in the package, if the other parts were delivered

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: JukaSan
Reviews.Content: For the price paid, the products are excellent. Mainly the battery charger for travel that is much more convenient and faster than what comes in the camera. The lightweight tripod, making it easy to transport. Very good buy!

Reviews.Title: Great bundle
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This bundle is truly essential.  I found all of the included products useful.  Great kit and they shipped it fast.

Reviews.Title: Perfect kit
Reviews.Author: Aenaey
Reviews.Content: Everything is wonderful. Great quality. Didnt really use the small tripod but everything else is amazing. Great group of products to enhance your camera experiance. All items seperate are far more expensive. Even a few seperate are more expensive. Get the kit and you cant go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Essentila kit for sony DSC-HX200V
Reviews.Author: Amaury Paulo de Souza
Reviews.Content: When I bougth the kit I thought it was sony products. I received products from several brands as the case that it is not a sony it is a Vivitar. The screen protectors are very bad. I  think Amzon should let it be clear when it seel these produts attache to a famous brand as sony

Reviews.Title: it works!
Reviews.Author: fei
Reviews.Content: This accessories kit works, but some of them seems not good enough, you known it is cheap, i like it.

Reviews.Title: Almost everything you need . . .
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: The considerations for the pieces in this kit skimped on the case size to hold the camera with the battery charger,  The only thing missing is a "HOW TO . . . " guide to get your creative juices flowing.

Reviews.Title: Everything I needed!
Reviews.Author: Derek McCowan
Reviews.Content: Very Complete kit. Everything I Needed! I would recommend this kit to anyone  that choose this camera. Much better than I thought it would be.

Reviews.Title: not all it seems to be
Reviews.Author: geoff grotz
Reviews.Content: The camera case  was seems to be smaller than the case the camera was issued with.  For an aftermarket item it should have the ability to hold the camera and those accessories that are sold with it, which this does not.

Reviews.Title: muy bueno
Reviews.Author: ALEJANDRO BAÑOS
Reviews.Content: la compra fue muy buena el equipo funcion exelente no tengo ninguna queja recomiendo al vendedor de estos productos gracias

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Simone A. de Alencastro
Reviews.Content: Everything is useful, not the finest quality but they all work fine for me!  The bag is just perfect, and the small tripod is what I use the most.  An extra battery is a must.  Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: kashaka reid
Reviews.Content: I enjoy this product. The tripod is a little flimy. it does not support the cameras weight. I love the battery and the bag!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Joao Thomeo Neto
Reviews.Content: Very good package, for a low price! Lots of accessories that any newbie hobby photographer needs for everyday situations. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: great little accessory kit
Reviews.Author: Gary Fischer
Reviews.Content: great little kit...delivery was on time ...many extras for the price... love the battery charger... better than hooking up a long wire and plugging into the camera...both tri pods are well made...pretty sturdy with the cam hooked to them... card reader is an extra for mebut worked just fine

Reviews.Title: tripod Flimsy
Reviews.Author: Ted Duckworth
Reviews.Content: This was purchase to go with Sony DSC-HX500V. While the bulk of the kit is a nice compliment, The Tripod in the kit is a bit on the Flimsy side, But you get what was paid for.

Reviews.Title: Can't ask for more at this price!
Reviews.Author: mitul
Reviews.Content: Awesome product and at this price, can't ask for anything better! The card reader works like a charm, the camera bag can fit in the camera along with the external charger, extra battery, small tripod, usb card reader and extra memory card case and still manage to be very light weight!

Reviews.Title: Accessories for Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX200V
Reviews.Author: RR
Reviews.Content: Great functional accessories for the camera, everything works great. It's great to have an extra battery on hand. Charging is fast with the wall charger.

Reviews.Title: Good Kit!
Reviews.Author: Calvin J Hohenshell
Reviews.Content: Everything in this kit has been of great use. I use the small tripod for shot stabilization from on the hood of a car.

Reviews.Title: Helpful to have all these in one purchase!
Reviews.Author: Roxanne S.
Reviews.Content: Great set of just the things you really need! I haven't used the mini-tripod yet....but all the other things I've been really glad to have!

Reviews.Title: gooe
Reviews.Author: randy
Reviews.Content: Very good and useful I use it a lot carry the bag around every day because I take a lot of pictures

Reviews.Title: nice good deal
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Just what you see here. Everything looks good and have had no problems. I enjoy it a lot for bday parties and you don't wanna be holding the camera all the time. Just leave it standing somewhere and shoot it all.

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: Pcaldecr
Reviews.Content: Very nice product, it's a complete option if you don't want to pay a lot of money, for aditional accesories

Reviews.Title: Definitely worth it
Reviews.Author: Susan n. Goodrich
Reviews.Content: I bought a used camera that came without some of the essentials. They are in this kit. The larger tripod was disappointing, but the rest of the items can't be beat for the price.

Reviews.Title: Everything was great except for...
Reviews.Author: Orlando A. Jimenez Jr.
Reviews.Content: All of the enclosures were of good quality and useful with the exception of the card reader. It is flimsy and cheaply made but a good thing for me, I really did not need it. All of the other accesories were fine and extreemly useful.

Reviews.Title: Essential Accessories Kit For Sony Cyber-shot
Reviews.Author: Silvanarr
Reviews.Content: It's ok considering the price. I haven't tested the battery yet. These kit would be a lot moe xpensive in my Country. Good deal.

Reviews.Title: Nice collection
Reviews.Author: Kimberly D Miller
Reviews.Content: I was in a hurry and this package gave me all the extras I needed at a great value without having to try to hunt things down individually.

Reviews.Title: Essential Accessories.......
Reviews.Author: Tammie "Tammie"
Reviews.Content: The camera case is too small to accommodate everything comfortably, especially when you factor in the camera.  Also, the Vivitar tripod literally FELL APART the first time I used it.  Screws came out of places that could not be repaired.  I would not recommend this kit to my worst enemy, let alone someone that I liked.

Reviews.Title: EVERYTHING WAS WONDERFUL MOM WAS HAPPY!
Reviews.Author: VINCENT A FORTANASCE
Reviews.Content: This Kit had everything she needed aside from the SD card of course! I wanted a high capacity SD for her so she wouldn't be swapping them out and of course run the risk of losing the card since they are so small. She went to Alaska and had a great time with the camera and these just make it way easier. NO this isn't Professional equipment but no one professional would be looking at this stuff anyway! ; )

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: bambam
Reviews.Content: I would like to start by saying I am not a professional photogropher. I picked up a floor model DSC-HX200V from XXXX XXX it needed everything. After buying this kit the only other piece I needed was an SD card. Which I already had laying around. The kit came with everything I needed, and a few things that were nice to have. The screen protectors it came with are the cut to fit type, I used one of the extras for my phone. I went to a local battery store to try to scoop a battery and charger, I paid 70 bucks for 1 battery and 1 charger. Two days later I recieved the kit and the batterys that it came with were actually better then the batterys the battery store sold. I went ahead got my 70 bucks back. also I ordered the Pack Battery And Charger Kit. for the money I spent I couldnt ask for more.2 Pack Battery And Charger Kit For Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-HX100V, DSC-HX200V Digital Digital Camera Includes 2 Extended (1000mAh) Replacement NP-FH50 Batteries + Ac/Dc Rapid Travel Charger + LCD Screen Protectors + MicroFiber Cleaning ClothEssential Accessories Kit For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX200V Digital Camera Includes Extended Replacement (1000 maH) NP-FH50 Battery + AC/DC Travel Charger + Mini HDMI Cable + USB 2.0 Card Reader + Deluxe Case + 50" Tripod w/Case + Screen Protectors + More

Reviews.Title: Everything you need
Reviews.Author: Dee "painted moon"
Reviews.Content: Off to the Grand Canyon and my camera dies. Amazon to the rescue, my new camera and all the supplies I needed were at my door in days. Everything was of excellent value. I was very pleased with all my accessories. The trip was a success! Thanks

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: The charger and spare battery are fine.  The mini-tripod supports the weight of the camera just fine, although other reviewers said it didn't.  I don't plan to use the screen protectors so I can't comment on the quality.  The HDMI cable fits my DSC-HX200V just fine, although other reviews said it didn't. Yes, the large tripod is a bit flimsy, but good tripods cost over 50 bucks so I'm not sweating it.  Got the wrong case, and their customer service took care of it right away hence the 4 stars for great customer service.  All in all I must say I got my money's worth and I will use this vendor again.

Reviews.Title: Great kit
Reviews.Author: Scooplip
Reviews.Content: Got this kit when I ordered the Sony camera for my wife and it came with just about everything you need for use of your camera and the wife loves it. Win, Win

Reviews.Title: camera accesssories kit
Reviews.Author: Galen Guillot
Reviews.Content: I was very surprise for all the items that was in this kit.I am very glad that we purchased this productwill recommend this product to anyone.Thanks,

Reviews.Title: Novist
Reviews.Author: Stadi
Reviews.Content: I am so glad that I stopped wasting money on dime store cameras and put forth some money for this great buy.  Well worth every dime.

Reviews.Title: Great kit!
Reviews.Author: Vanessa Friedrich Cassali
Reviews.Content: Has everything you may need to use your camera, tripod, extra battery, universal charger, cables, etc...Surely a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Accessories for Sony cyber shot Dsc hx200v
Reviews.Author: Fred stahly
Reviews.Content: Great kit. Great value. Has all those things your going to need to enjoy your new camera.  Would have got 5 stars if it included a small memory chip you need to operate camera

Reviews.Title: Very good bargain.
Reviews.Author: Pedro Seals "Peter"
Reviews.Content: Rated based on the usefulness of the contents.No dislikes at all. The camera case, back-up battery and battery charger work well.I would recommend this package to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great kit!
Reviews.Author: Kathy Bonham
Reviews.Content: This kit was just what I was looking for! Great kit with everything I needed. Very nice quality at a great price. Delivery was quick, too. Thanks! I will be ordering in the future.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Kit
Reviews.Author: Mach5
Reviews.Content: I received the kit in less than a week and it has everything I needed. The battery in the kit is the same spare you can buy from Sony, and they want $50 for just the battery! The quick charger and HDMI cable work perfectly. I love this kit and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a good deal and good quality product.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM!
Reviews.Author: 123setgo
Reviews.Content: I received the Essential Accessories Kit for the Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-HX200V.  The description of this kit says that it is made for this camera and its accessories.  The camera will not fit in the soft sided case; the description said it was a Deluxe Hard Shell Case with room for the accessories, which it is not.  The 4" tripod will not hold the camera up.  The 50" tripod is so wobbly that I would not risk putting the camera on it.  The screen guard peals off if you barely touch it.  I also ordered the 2-Pack Battery and Charger kit.  When I opened the box, I found the contents of each order simply dumped in the bottom of the box - nothing was in its own box, so I had to lay everything out and figure out what item went with which order.  The description, unseparated orders and quality of the product is very misleading!  I want a total refund for the Essential Accessories Kit, including the shipping / handling fees and a prepaid return label.  When I called the company, I got a message that said they were closed until Oct. 10, 2013!  Warning do not buy this product.  Amazon should take this product off of its site!

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit Includes Some Of The Essential Accessories You Need To Take Full Advantage Of Your New Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX200V Digital Camera
50 Inch Professional Photo Video Tripod- 3-Way Pan head, Rapid-Action Locks Legs, Built In Bubble Leveling, Quick release Platform, Rubber feet, includes Carrying Case
Hi Capacity Lithium 1000MAH Replacement extended Battery For Sony NP-FH50 + 110/220 Ac/Dc Rapid Travel Charger For Sony NP-FH50
UPDATE AS OF 5/22/2013 - We upgraded the case in this kit to allow you to fit the camera and all accessories included in the kit - Deluxe Hard Shell Case, Revolutionary Design, Durable hard Shell Construction, Adjustable Shoulder Strap, Holds Digital Cam
ProductInfo.Name: Essential Accessories Kit For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX200V, DSC-HX100V Digital Camera Includes Extended Replacement (1000 maH) NP-FH50 Battery + AC/DC Travel Charger + USB 2.0 Card Reader + Deluxe Case + 50 Tripod w/Case + Screen Protectors + More
